inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getPolicy.

policyId.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the policy that you want more details on. Policy id starts with a "p-" followed by 8-28 lowercase or uppercase letters, digits, and underscores.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getPolicy.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name of the policy.

awsManaged.description: Indicates if a policy is an AWS managed policy.

content.description: The text content of the policy.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

name.description: The friendly name of the policy.

type.description: The type of policy values can be `SERVICE_CONTROL_POLICY | TAG_POLICY | BACKUP_POLICY | AISERVICES_OPT_OUT_POLICY`
